channel.title: Ask a Chinese
channel.description:
Yup, this is another "Ask a ..." thread. But I can try to answer these questions of your on these Major Eastern Civilian.
Any Question, even about Malaysia.

item.title: Ask a Chinese
item.dc:creator: CPU
item.description:
Dr. Karamazov:

Is it true that no matter what I do you will be able to do it 10 times better purely by being an Asian?

methinks to myself….I imagine that to be true no matter who he asked.

Read full topic

item.title: Ask a Chinese
item.dc:creator: Dr_Karamazov
item.description:
Zuul:

Yeah …like he KNOWS…

Chinese cops in China.

Are you absolutely sure that’s true???

Would it be out of place to start a new thread called" ask a finn/swede?

Fuck it I’ll go for it.

I’d agree with him, nothing would happen 90% of the time.
Imagine shouting out “Suck my balls” to a cop in Europe. 90% of the time they’d ignore you because you’re not worth the effort. But there is that 10% who would take you in for it.
Most Chinese cops (at least in Shanghai) wouldn’t bother to raise a finger.
I got wasted once in a KTV (Karaoke) bar and started shouting abuse at some police (yeah, I was trying to be the biggest idiot of the week) and they just looked at me and went on drinking their tea.

Even if they Chinese cop did take offense to your comments about Tibet he’d probably just extract a bribe from you. Most crimes are solved by paying money to someone.
For example; An American girl was almost hit by a Chinese driver. She banged on the side of his car to let him know that he was reversing into her.
He got out the car and started punching her in the face. The man’s wife also got out of the car and joined in beating the American girl.
The police came and demanded the Chinese couple give the girl 4000yuan (about $400) in compensation (the police probably also would have gotten $100 too). The American girl refused the money and demanded that they be charged for their crimes. The police told her to take the money or get nothing. She refused to take the money and the couple were never charged.
It’s just not worth the effort for police to arrest such people. So much paperwork, nobody gets any bribes. The crime is so slight that the couple would be released anyway, so why bother going through all that effort?

For most petty crimes they don’t bother.

Sure, if you murder someone, then they’re going to come down on you hard. But if you shoplift or get into a fight they wont do much.

China isn’t some evil police state. The police are pretty nice guys in general. Strangely it’s hard to find a street cop who’s under 40 in Shanghai. I guess the young ones are all off doing special training or something.

Read full topic

item.title: Ask a Chinese
item.dc:creator: Eric_Fong
item.description:
Sassy, stop being so stubborn about it. I am just stupid, kay?

Dr. Karamazov:

Actually, I have a question;

Is there any friction between native Malaysians and Chinese Malaysians?
I know in Japan the Chinese and Koreans living there have it tough. Even those who are 3rd or 4th generation are still discriminated against.

Three main race, Malay, Chinese and Indian Malaysian.

Maxey:

Nice one, now stop trying to dodge the question and really answer it.

Not really, all the cop in Malaysia are Malay and Indian

https://youtu.be/2GregAwtHu8

Read full topic
